name: Tom Antion
what_you_do: Executive speech coaching and individual presentation skills training, including video feedback and confidential speech critiques.
who_you_serve: CEOs, vice presidents, and top executives who need to elevate their presentation skills.
social_proof: Delivered over 2000 presentations; authored a book on presenting; coached executives from organizations including National Center for Nonprofit Boards and Greater Las Vegas Chamber of Commerce.
business_focus: Helping top executives and business leaders improve their presentation and public speaking skills through individualized coaching.
service_provided: Individual presentation skills coaching, Freeze-Frame Video Feedback training, post-training support via phone/fax/email, confidential presentation critiques, custom written speech critiques
